title: Child hospitalized after Franklinton shooting
content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio (WSYX/WTTE) -- Police are investigating the a shooting that sent one child to the hospital early Tuesday evening.
Officers responded to a reported shooting in the 200 block of Dana Avenue around 4:45 p.m.
Police said the child was shot in the home and taken to Nationwide Children's Hospital.
Their condition and identity have yet to be released.
We'll have more details in this developing story when they're made available.
